name: EV-B Spectra Harness the power of dual motors in the Spectra, offering unmatched torque and a smooth ride, wrapped in a sleek, metallic frame.
EV-B Nova Experience the Nova’s cutting-edge design with its integrated solar charging panels, ensuring you stay powered up no matter where your journey takes you.
EV-B Comet The Comet redefines speed with its aerodynamic build and ultra-lightweight materials, enabling rapid acceleration and high performance.
EV-B Eclipse Enjoy the silence with Eclipse’s whisper-quiet engine and vibration damping system for a truly serene biking experience.
